ConversationChat.configureAssistantHint: Create at least one assistant in the Assistants page.
ConversationChat.emptyMessagesHint: Send a message to get started.
ConversationChat.connectorReadOnlyNotice: This conversation comes from Discord. Replies are sent on Discord; history is shown here read-only.

ConversationPage.title: Conversations
ConversationPage.subtitle: Chat with your assistant. Select an assistant and send messages or images.
ConversationPage.errorChooseAssistant: Select an assistant to send a message.

ConversationSidebar.title: Conversations
ConversationSidebar.emptyHint: No conversations. Click « New » or send a message.

AssistantPage.title: Assistants
AssistantPage.subtitle: Create reusable assistants and link them to your connectors.
AssistantPage.assistantsSectionDescription: Create and manage reusable assistants with their LLM model and tools.
AssistantPage.noAssistantsDescription: Create an assistant to define which LLM model to use and which tools are available.
AssistantPage.bindingsSectionDescription: Link an assistant to each connector to reply to messages.
AssistantPage.noConnectorDescription: Add and enable a connector from the Plugins page to link it to an assistant.

AssistantCard.deleteDialogDescription: This will delete the assistant "{{name}}". This action cannot be undone.

EditAssistantDialog.description: Set the name, LLM model, system prompt and available tools.
EditAssistantDialog.systemPromptPlaceholder: E.g. You are a helpful and concise assistant. Reply in English.
EditAssistantDialog.memoryEnabledDescription: Allow the assistant to store and recall facts about the user via the "remember" tool.
EditAssistantDialog.errorNoName: Please enter a name for the assistant.

PluginsPage.title: Plugins
PluginsPage.subtitle: Manage your connectors, LLMs and tools
PluginsPage.noPluginsHint: Add your first plugin to get started

PluginCard.removeDialogDescription: This will remove the plugin "{{name}}" and all its configuration. This action cannot be undone.
PluginCard.modelsDialogDescription: List of LLM models provided by this plugin
PluginCard.toolsDialogDescription: List of tools this plugin provides

EditPluginDialog.title: Configure plugin
EditPluginDialog.description: Edit the name and configuration of the plugin.
EditPluginDialog.noConfigHint: No editable configuration for this plugin.

HomeAssistantConfigForm.baseUrlHint: Base URL of your instance (without /api). E.g. http://192.168.1.10:8123
HomeAssistantConfigForm.accessTokenPlaceholder: Token from Profile → Long-Lived Access Tokens
HomeAssistantConfigForm.accessTokenHint: Create a token in Home Assistant: Profile → Long-Lived Access Tokens

FilesConfigForm.directoryHint: Directory where files will be created (relative to server). Default: output

ComfyUIConfigForm.baseUrlHint: Base URL of your ComfyUI instance. E.g. http://localhost:8188
ComfyUIConfigForm.workflowPlaceholder: Paste your ComfyUI workflow JSON here...
ComfyUIConfigForm.workflowHint: Export your workflow from ComfyUI (API format). Use {{positivePrompt}}, {{negativePrompt}}, {{width}}, {{height}}, {{imageUrl}}, {{denoise}}, {{steps}}, {{cfgScale}}, {{seed}} as placeholders. No default: provide at least one workflow.
ComfyUIConfigForm.workflowHint_upscale: Required for image upscaling (4x resolution enhancement). Uses ESRGAN or SD refinement. Placeholders: {{imageUrl}}, {{positivePrompt}}, {{steps}}, {{cfgScale}}, {{seed}}.

PluginForm.fillClientIdSecret: Enter the Client ID and Client Secret.
PluginForm.allowPopupsRetry: Allow popups for this site, then try again.
PluginForm.redirectUriHint: Add the redirect URI to your {{provider}} OAuth credentials.
PluginForm.discordAllowedChannelsHint: If empty, the bot listens in all channels. Otherwise it only replies in the listed channels.
PluginForm.telegramBotTokenHint: Create a bot with @BotFather on Telegram and paste the token here.
PluginForm.telegramAllowedChatIdsHint: If empty, the bot replies in all chats. Otherwise it only replies in the listed chats (user or group IDs).

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.subtitle: Your hub: recent conversations, quick actions and system status.
Dashboard.quickNewConversationHint: Start or continue a chat in the web UI.
Dashboard.quickAssistantsHint: Configure which LLM replies per connector.
Dashboard.statusDescription: To get the most out of Whisper Weave:
Dashboard.warnNoLLM: No LLM provider enabled. Add one in Plugins.
Dashboard.warnNoConnector: No connector enabled. Add one in Plugins.
Dashboard.warnNoAssistant: No assistant configured. Configure one per connector.
Dashboard.recentConversationsDescription: Jump back into a recent chat.
Dashboard.noConversationsYet: No conversations yet. Start one from the Conversations page.

SkillsPage.title: Skills
SkillsPage.subtitle: Create and manage LLM skills as Markdown files. Skills are stored in the skills/ folder and exposed to the LLM via tools (list_skills, get_skill).
SkillsPage.emptyHint: Create a skill to give the LLM reusable instructions or knowledge in Markdown.
SkillsPage.createDescription: Skill ID is the filename (without .md). Content is Markdown.
SkillsPage.editDescription: Edit the Markdown content of this skill.
SkillsPage.skillIdHint: Used as filename (e.g. my-skill → skills/my-skill.md). Letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores only.
SkillsPage.pluginDisabledHint: Enable the Skills plugin to create and manage LLM skills.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.subtitle: Appearance and language.
SettingsPage.aboutDescription: Whisper Weave – connect messaging platforms to LLMs
SettingsPage.version: Version 0.1.0 – Built with React, Vite, TanStack Router, Hono, Bun.

AutomationsPage.title: Automations
AutomationsPage.subtitle: Schedule automated tasks that run LLM prompts and send results to connectors.
AutomationsPage.emptyHint: Create an automation to run scheduled LLM tasks.
AutomationsPage.addDescription: Set up a scheduled task that sends a prompt to an LLM and delivers the result.
AutomationsPage.cronHelp: Uses cron syntax. All times are UTC.
AutomationsPage.assistantHint: The result will be sent to this assistant's connector default channel.

WebSearchConfigForm.apiKeyHint: Get a free API key (2000 req/month) at
WebSearchConfigForm.maxResultsHint: Number of search results to return (1-10). Default: 5. Without an API key, DuckDuckGo is used as fallback.
